name: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Stormtroopers Prosperity Pack
name_original: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Stormtroopers Prosperity Pack
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world’s first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle gives you Premium skins of KATO Stormtrooper Flatout.

This Bundle includes:

- TechWars: Global Conflict - The Game - Flatout Prosperity Age Premium skin - Flatout Prosperity Legacy Premium skin
